content: Shalev Ben-David Search Shalev Ben-David Associate Professor of Computer Science Institute for Quantum Computing, University of Waterloo I am an Associate Professor at the David R. Cheriton School of Computer Science and the Institute for Quantum Computing at the University of Waterloo. My research interests include computational complexity and quantum computing.
